item.title: The pomp and pageantry ends as Trump's state visit gets down to business
item.description: Trump is heading to Chequers, the official country residence of Prime Minister Keir Starmer, for talks with the British leader and business delegation...

item.title: ABC pulls Jimmy Kimmel show off air 'indefinitely' over Charlie Kirk comments
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel suggested that Tyler Robinson, the man accused of killing Charlie Kirk, was aligned with President Donald Trump's MAGA movement.

item.title: China's defense minister urges greater unity to avoid 'law of the jungle'
item.description: China's defense minister on Thursday urged greater efforts for global unity, warning against an increasingly divided world "defined by the rule of the...

item.title: Johnson says Democrats will 'lose that battle' if shutdown hinges on ACA subsidies
item.description: Democrats have zeroed in on health care as their central sticking point in negotiations while the threat of a government shutdown nears.

item.title: Bessent made mortgage claims similar to ones Trump cited to try to fire Fed's Cook: Report
item.description: Bessent has suggested that Fed Governor Lisa Cook should be removed over allegations that she committed mortgage fraud, which she denies.
